headline: How The Microchip Technology (MCHP) Story Is Shifting As Recovery Optimism Meets Valuation Caution
summary: Microchip Technology’s fair value estimate has shifted slightly, moving from US$86.96 to US$86.60 per share, while several firms have been recalibrating their price targets into the US$80s and US$90s. This small adjustment comes as analysts balance stronger bookings, healthier backlog, and improved guidance against questions about how much optimism is already reflected in the share price. Read on to see how you can track these changing targets and interpret the evolving narrative around...
